input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large)

Product specifications:
Measures 30" x 48"
Made of coir coco palm fiber and painted using fade resistant enamel paints
Simply vacuum or hose down to clean

Product description:
Welcome guests to your home in style
Features colorful poppies
input_text.Response A:
Greetings, esteemed homeowner! Are you in quest of an exquisite doormat that not only elevates your home's aesthetic appeal but also boasts unparalleled durability and ease of maintenance? Look no further than the Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large), the pinnacle of luxurious welcome mats!

This majestic doormat measures a spacious 30" x 48", crafted from premium coir coco palm fiber, meticulously painted with fade-resistant enamel paints to ensure a vibrant, long-lasting display of colorful poppies. The intricate design not only adds a touch of whimsy and warmth to your entranceway but also serves as a sturdy, absorbent barrier against mud, slush, and other forms of inclement weather.

As an added convenience, this extraordinary doormat can be easily cleaned via vacuuming or hose-down, ensuring minimal upkeep while maintaining its show-stopping appearance. With its generous size and exceptional craftsmanship, the Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large) is the perfect addition to your home's welcoming ambiance, inviting guests to step inside with grace and style.

So why settle for a mundane doormat when you can elevate your home's curb appeal with this extraordinary piece? Make a lasting impression on your visitors and add a touch of whimsical elegance to your entranceway with the Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large). Order yours today and experience the unparalleled quality and sophistication that only this exceptional doormat can provide!

Interest: "Elevate your home's curb appeal and create a lasting first impression with our beautifully crafted coir doormat. Measuring 30" x 48", it's the perfect size to greet guests and add a pop of color to your entranceway. Action: "Don't settle for a boring, generic doormat - upgrade to the Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large) today and make a statement of style and sophistication. Order now and elevate your home's entrance to the next level!"

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
